metadata.description: Required: No | Region of the Function App. This does not need to be the same as the location of the Azure Virtual Desktop Host Pool. | Default: Location of the resource group.
Required: Yes | Name of the Log Analytics Workspace used by the Function App Insights.
Required: No | Name of the resource group containing the Azure Virtual Desktop Host Pool. | Default: The resource group of the Function App.
Required: Yes | Name of the Azure Virtual Desktop Host Pool.
Required: Yes | Prefix used for the name of the session hosts.
Required: NO | Separator between prefix and number. | Default: -
Required: Yes | Number of session hosts to maintain in the host pool.
Required: Yes | The maximum number of session hosts to add during a replacement process
Required: No | Switches to using the US Governmment DoD graph endpoints for the Function App. | Default: false
Required: No | Resource Id of the User Assigned Managed Identity to use for the Function App. | Default: System Identity
Required: No | Tag name used to indicate that a session host should be included in the automatic replacement process. | Default: IncludeInAutoReplace.
Required: No | Tag name used to indicate the timestamp of the last deployment of a session host. | Default: AutoReplaceDeployTimestamp.
Required: No | Tag name used to indicate drain timestamp of session host pending deletion. | Default: AutoReplacePendingDrainTimestamp.
Required: No | Tag name used to exclude session host from Scaling Plan activities. | Default: ScalingPlanExclusion
Required: No | Target age of session hosts in days. | Default:  45 days.
Required: No | Grace period in hours for session hosts to drain before deletion. | Default: 24 hours.

Required: No | If true, will apply tags for Include In Auto Replace and Deployment Timestamp to existing session hosts. This will not enable automatic deletion of existing session hosts. | Default: True.
Required: No | When enabled, the Session Host Replacer will automatically consider pre-existing VMs for replacement if they meet the criteria | Default: False.
Required: No | Prefix used for the deployment name of the session hosts. | Default: AVDSessionHostReplacer
Required: No | Number of digits to use for the instance number of the session hosts (eg. AVDVM-01). | Default: 2
Required: No | If true, will replace session hosts when a new image version is detected. | Default: true
Required: No | Delay in days before replacing session hosts when a new image version is detected. | Default: 0 (no delay).
Required: No | The name of the parameter in the template that specifies the VM Names array.
Required: No | Leave this empty to deploy to same resource group as the host pool.

variables.varSecurityProfile: [if(equals(parameters('SecurityType'), 'Standard'), null(), createObject('securityType', parameters('SecurityType'), 'uefiSettings', createObject('secureBootEnabled', parameters('SecureBootEnabled'), 'vTpmEnabled', parameters('TpmEnabled'))))]
variables.varDomainJoinObject: [if(equals(parameters('IdentityServiceProvider'), 'EntraID'), createObject('DomainType', 'EntraID', 'IntuneJoin', parameters('IntuneEnrollment')), createObject('DomainType', 'ActiveDirectory', 'DomainName', parameters('ADDomainName'), 'DomainJoinUserName', parameters('ADDomainJoinUserName'), 'ADOUPath', parameters('ADOUPath')))]

value.name: _SessionHostParameters
value.value: [string(createObject('Location', parameters('SessionHostsRegion'), 'AvailabilityZones', parameters('AvailabilityZones'), 'VMSize', parameters('SessionHostSize'), 'AcceleratedNetworking', parameters('AcceleratedNetworking'), 'DiskType', parameters('SessionHostDiskType'), 'ImageReference', variables('varImageReference'), 'SecurityProfile', variables('varSecurityProfile'), 'SubnetId', parameters('SubnetId'), 'DomainJoinObject', variables('varDomainJoinObject'), 'DomainJoinPassword', if(equals(parameters('IdentityServiceProvider'), 'EntraID'), null(), createObject('reference', createObject('keyVault', createObject('id', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'deployKeyVault'), '2022-09-01').outputs.keyVaultId.value), 'secretName', 'DomainJoinPassword'))), 'AdminUsername', parameters('LocalAdminUsername'), 'tags', createObject()))]

metadata.description: Required: No | Region of the Function App. This does not need to be the same as the location of the Azure Virtual Desktop Host Pool. | Default: Location of the resource group.
Required: Yes | Name of the Log Analytics Workspace used by the Function App Insights.
Required: Yes | Name of the Function App.
Required: No | URL of the FunctionApp.zip file. This is the zip file containing the Function App code. | Default: The latest release of the Function App code.
Required: No | App Service Plan Name | Default: Y1 for consumption based plan
Required: No | App Service Plan Tier | Default: Dynamic for consumption based plan

siteConfig.appSettings: [union(createArray(createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', 'value', '~4'), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME', 'value', 'powershell'), createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', variables('varStorageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', variables('varStorageAccountName')), '2022-05-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_CONTENTAZUREFILECONNECTIONSTRING', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', variables('varStorageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', variables('varStorageAccountName')), '2022-05-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', variables('varAppServicePlanName')), '2020-02-02').InstrumentationKey), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_CONTENTSHARE', 'value', toLower(parameters('FunctionAppName')))), if(parameters('EnableMonitoring'), createArray(createObject('name', 'APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', variables('varAppServicePlanName')), '2020-02-02').InstrumentationKey)), createArray()), parameters('ReplacementPlanSettings'))]

properties.description: Template Spec for deploying VMs through the AVD Replacement Plan
properties.displayName: AVD Replacement Plan Session Host Template
